picard.vcf.processor

Class VcfPathSegmentGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • picard.vcf.processor.VcfPathSegmentGenerator

  • public abstract class VcfPathSegmentGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes a mechanism for producing VcfPathSegments from a VCF file path.
